items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
items.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

items.content_html: A lightweight browser-based car racing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Steer your car to avoid oncoming traffic and see how long you can last! * Features Smooth keyboard controls (Arrow keys) Increasing difficulty over time Score tracking Responsive design No external libraries ‚Äì pure HTML, CSS, and JS. Supports Multiplayer.
items.title: tanishqv07/CarRace: A lightweight browser-based car racing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Steer your car to avoid oncoming traffic and see how long you can last!  * Features Smooth keyboard controls (Arrow keys)  Increasing difficulty over time  Score tracking  Responsive design  No external libraries ‚Äì pure HTML, CSS, and JS. Supports Multiplayer.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A sleek and modern developer portfolio built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience in an optimized and responsive layout. This portfolio is fast and lightweight, powered by Vite for optimal performance, and features a customizable UI styled with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI.
